briefTitle: Study of Blood Samples From Patients With Malignant Melanoma, Metastatic Breast Cancer, Advanced Lung Cancer, Pancreatic Cancer, or Colorectal Cancer.
officialTitle: Collaborative Project on Potential Serum Markers for Malignant Melanoma, Metastatic Breast, Advanced Lung Pancreatic Carcinoma and Colorectal Cancer
conditions: Breast Cancer, Colorectal Cancer, Lung Cancer, Melanoma (Skin), Pancreatic Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Detection of peptide and protein markers in serum
eligibilityCriteria:
DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS:

* Diagnosis of 1 of the following advanced metastatic malignancies:

  * Malignant melanoma
  * Lung cancer
  * Breast cancer
  * Pancreatic carcinoma
  * Colorectal cancer
* Advanced and/or metastatic disease
* Hormone receptor status not specified

PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS:

* Menopausal status not specified

PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY:

* Not specified
